about_the_game:
About the Game:

Day of Invasion Reloaded is the Finished and Cleaned up Version of the 2017 released beta "Day of Invasion 1" made with Game Guru.
The Reloaded Version features new weapons, enhanced UI, Enhanced Sound Design and a new Soundtrack.

Story:

In Day of Invasion, you find yourself in a dark and dangerous world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, after a viral breakout occurred in the local Facilities of Horton Genetics. Your journey begins in the abandoned village of Balthon, once a busy place, now overrun by bloodthirsty Infected. Your goal: the distant Milespring City, the last glimmer of hope for your survival.
On Your way, you will find a large variety of Weapons, that will help you to fight your way through the dangerous Valley.

Gameplay:

Day of Invasion: Reloaded is a First Person Zombie Shooter with simple combat mechanics.
The Game takes roughly around 20 minutes to complete.

Dev Note:

Day of Invasion was the First game we ever made.
We initially wanted to release it on steam vie Steam Greenlight back in 2017, but it got rejected.
Now, 7 years later, we gave it a polish and finally put it up here in order to add another perspective to the story of the Horton Genetics Disaster.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and Gore. You will shoot and kill Zombies.
